page.title: 20Marton & Birdingbury,Leisure
page.content: Most of the village children have to travel outside their village for recreational activities.One club locally is the Sky Blue Connextion. This is the practice ground for Coventry City Football Club.The club house is very big.It has several types of courts:squash,badminton and basketball.Outside are facilities for football & cricket.In the summertime most activities take place on the Coventry City practice ground.It costs Â£2 a year to join the club and 40p a week to participate in the sports.When a person joins they receive a blue membership card. Speedway is another popular spectator sport.The local stadium is at Brandon. It is the home stadium of the Coventry Bees. Yellow and black are the club colours.It is a cinder racing track which covers the spectators in dust.
